history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. qauto use: Rplus_comm, Rplus_assoc, Rplus_le_compat. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_assoc. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_le_compat_l,Rplus_assoc. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_le_compat_l,Rplus_assoc.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?M1841 + (?M1842 + ?M1843)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 + r2 + r3 = r1 + (r2 + r3) a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c <= d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "c + d" with "a + b + c".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 + r2 + r3 = r1 + (r2 + r3) H0 : forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r + r1 <= r + r2 a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c <= d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "b <= c" with "a + b + c + c <= c + d + c".

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Rplus_le_reg_r with (r := c). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. apply Rplus_le_compat_l. apply H2.
